user.title: Samsung SmartThings
user.description: Choose how you want to connect. Recommended: reuse the existing Home Assistant SmartThings login (no credentials). OAuth2 (bring your own app) is for developers. PAT tokens may be short-lived. Local Soundbar connects directly on your LAN.

cloud_ha_smartthings.title: SmartThings Cloud (Home Assistant SmartThings)
cloud_ha_smartthings.description: Select which existing Home Assistant SmartThings account to reuse for authentication.

cloud_pat.title: SmartThings Cloud (PAT)
cloud_pat.description: Enter your SmartThings Personal Access Token (PAT). Note: SmartThings PATs may expire (often 24 hours).

soundbar_local.title: Soundbar Local (LAN)
soundbar_local.description: Connect directly to a supported 2024 Samsung Wi-Fi soundbar on your LAN (HTTPS JSON-RPC on port 1516). Enable IP control in the SmartThings app first.

error.invalid_ha_smartthings: Please select a valid Home Assistant SmartThings account.

abort.already_configured: This SmartThings account is already configured.
abort.no_ha_smartthings: No Home Assistant SmartThings integration found. Add the built-in SmartThings integration first, then come back and choose this option.

data.expose_all: Expose all attributes and no-arg commands (advanced, many entities)
